name: GetPosition
documentation:
Query to retrieve the current tracked {@link io.fluxzero.common.api.tracking.Position} for a given {@code consumer} and {@link MessageType}.

This is typically used for administrative, diagnostic, or monitoring purposes to inspect the progress of a consumer within a message stream.

Use Cases

  • Determine how far a consumer has progressed in processing a given message type
  • Verify if a reset or store operation has taken effect
  • Generate metrics or dashboards on consumer lag

Note that this request will return the position as tracked by the Fluxzero Runtime, regardless of any in-memory state held by local trackers. @see io.fluxzero.common.api.tracking.Position @see StorePosition @see ResetPosition

fields.name: consumer
fields.documentation: The name of the consumer whose position is being queried.

fields.name: messageType
fields.documentation: The type of messages being consumed (e.g., {@code EVENT}, {@code COMMAND}, etc.).
